actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide duty-free treatment of certain alloy tool steels used for making chipper knives.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend the custom duty on certain alloy tool steel until June 30, 1981.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide duty-free treatment of certain alloy tool steels used for making chipper knives.
